alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 12:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scott and northwestern Polk Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beauchamp, or 15 miles northwest of Mena, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beauchamp... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Acorn... Black Fork... Rich Mountain... Black Fork Mountain Wilderness... Eagleton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
